nodes.text: The Tube-Launched Grapple was a one-shot grappling hook launcher produced by Line Master. The device was a hollow cylinder forty centimeters long with a ten centimeter diameter. It had a pop up targeting sight, retractable hand grip with braking controls, and one hundred meters of ultralight micro-woven synthecord. The cable was attached to a flat, flexible disk covered in a strong bonding agent which adhered to any surface.
